au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig.primitive

Interface IPrimitiveAcl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MasterAllowed, MasterOnlyAclController, RoleFilteredAcl, SlaveActiveAllowed

    public interface IPrimitiveAcl
    Interface that provides a hook to allow or deny specific roles from performing an action. Without implementing this interface all authenticated roles are allowed to perform primitive control including master, slave active and slave passive.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowRole(IRigSession.Session session, java.lang.String action)
      Returns true if the provided session role is allowed to perform the requested action.

    • Method Detail

      • allowRole

        boolean allowRole(IRigSession.Session session,
                java.lang.String action)
        Returns true if the provided session role is allowed to perform the requested action.
        Parameters:
        session - role who is the requestor
        action - the action that is requested
        Returns:
        true if the role is allowed to perform the action
